LanguageData.Resur.UI.MaxMoodLimitTip: <color=#FF6666>Note:\nResurreviewy maximum heartiness under the curse of immortality will be 50%.</color>
LanguageData.Resur.Incident.LetterResurreviPass: Resurreviewy, a wandering race of immortals, has appeared. If you wish to borrow their power, you can attempt to take them on.
LanguageData.Resur.Incident.BackEffect: Side effects of the treatment have occurred.
